tool_description: Manages notification templates including creation, updates, and retrieval of templates for different communication types and channels.

action.description: Action to perform: create, update, retrieve, delete, list

template_id.description: Unique template identifier (required for update, retrieve, delete)

notification_type.description: Notification category: order_updates, promotions, newsletters, account_alerts

error_messages: Invalid action: action must be one of: create, update, retrieve, delete, list.
Template not found: The specified template_id does not exist.
Missing required fields: template_name, channel_type, and notification_type are required for create action.
Invalid channel type: channel_type must be one of: email, sms, push.
Invalid notification type: notification_type must be one of: order_updates, promotions, newsletters, account_alerts.
Template validation failed: Template content contains invalid placeholder variables.
usage: Specify the action to perform. For create/update, provide template details. For retrieve/delete, provide template_id.
